title: @Riot KateyKhaos
body:
Hello!
 
After seeing the new harrowing skins, i was a bit disappointed, not because they aren't cool, it's mostly because of the champions choice.

Let me explain: For ages, everyone have been waiting for a new Azir skin.I gotta admit, Azir isn't the oldest champ in the league, but he's been out for about a year now and some champions that are A LOT MORE recent already got a few skins...(Like kalista already base+blood moon + championship, ekko already got base+release+ academy, etc.)Meanwhile, our little azir, which is played quite a lot, still only have his release skin.

Don't get me wrong, i'm not saying azir should've had an harrowing skin(even if i think the opportunity was great and there was a tons of idea that could've been great), but i'm starting to wonder if we'll ever see an Azir skin.

Any thoughts?


Oh and between, if you answer me,  you'll be the first rioter to ever answer one of my post and automatically become my favourite one hahaha.

replies.body:
*COUGH* KARTHUS *COUGH*

_^ just ganna leave this here_

I understand your point, but you have to admit 2 things:

1.Even if karthus have been around for a lot more time, he also have quite a few skins.

2.Azir is played a lot more than karthus.If i see a karthus once every 100 games its good hahaha.

Hey Takito, 

Of course you'll be seeing another Azir skin in the future! It's been a little over a year since his launch skin, which means he could definitely use a new skin. We keep track of last release dates of skins and keep them in mind when we're deciding on what's coming down the pipeline in terms of new skins. 

To speak to some of the other champions/skins you've mentioned - they received skins because we felt they fit in well with the thematics we created. For example, Championship Kalista was an easy pick because she was a pretty impactful champion this season. While Ekko was a newer champion, we thought his personality and model leant itself to a cool school-themed skin.
